Load data and packages

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggridges)

part <- read_csv(here::here("processed_data", "partitioned_co2.csv"))
chamber_levels = c("c_1_amb", "c_2_amb", "c_3_e0.75", "c_4_e1.5", "c_5_e2.25",
                   "c_6_e2.25", "c_7_e3.0", "c_8_e3.75", "c_9_e3.75",
                   "c_10_e4.5", "c_11_e5.25", "c_12_e6.0")

color.gradient=c('blue4','blue3','turquoise4','lightseagreen',
                 'mediumseagreen','limegreen','yellowgreen','yellow2',
                 'darkgoldenrod2','darkorange2','orangered1','red2')
```

```{r}
part %>%
  mutate(MIU_VALVE = factor(MIU_VALVE, levels = 1:12, 
                            labels = chamber_levels)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = CH4, y = MIU_VALVE, fill = MIU_VALVE))+
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0, color = "grey50")+
  stat_density_ridges(
    geom = "density_ridges",
    quantiles = 2,
    quantile_lines = TRUE,
    n = 2048,
    rel_min_height = 0.005,
    scale = 0.9
  ) +
  xlab(expression(CH[4]~"(µmol"~m^-2~s^-1*")"))+
  scale_fill_manual(values = color.gradient)+
  coord_cartesian(xlim = c(-0.003,0.04))+
  egg::theme_article()+
  theme(legend.position = "none",
        axis.title.y = element_blank())

quants <- part %>%
  filter(!is.na(CH4)) %>%
  mutate(MIU_VALVE = factor(MIU_VALVE, levels = 1:12, 
                            labels = chamber_levels),
         Date = as.Date(DateTime),
         Temp_C = sub("c_[0-9]+_[e|a]", "", MIU_VALVE),
         Temp_C = as.numeric(sub("mb", "0", Temp_C))) %>%
  group_by(Date)  %>%
  filter(length(unique(MIU_VALVE)) == 12) %>%
  group_by(MIU_VALVE, Temp_C) %>%
  summarize(q_50 = quantile(CH4, .50),
            #q_5 = quantile(CH4, .05),
            q_95 = quantile(CH4, .95),
            q_99 = quantile(CH4, .99)) %>%
  pivot_longer(q_50:q_99) %>%
  group_by(name) %>%
  mutate(ref = mean(value[Temp_C == 0]),
         name = as.numeric(sub("q_", "", name)),
         name_txt = paste0(name, "th quantile"),
         name_txt = fct_reorder(name_txt, name)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Temp_C, y = value/ref * 100))+
  geom_hline(yintercept = 100, color = "grey50")+
  geom_smooth(color = "black", fill = "grey70")+
  geom_point(aes(fill = MIU_VALVE), color = "black", 
             shape = 21, size = 2, stroke = 0.5)+
  scale_fill_manual(values = color.gradient, name = "Chamber")+
  ylab(expression(atop(CH[4]~"flux quantile value", "(% of ambient; ppm"~m^-2~s^-1*")")))+
  xlab("Temperature treatment (ºC above ambient)")+
  facet_wrap(~name_txt)+
  egg::theme_article()+
  theme(panel.grid.major = element_line(color = "grey95"))

quants

ggsave("../figures/quantiles.jpg", width = 6, height = 3)
```

Repeating with 2021

```{r}
fluxes_2021 <- read_csv(here::here("processed_data", "L0_2021_best_fits.csv"))
fluxes_2025 <- read_csv(here::here("processed_data", "L0_for_dashboard.csv"))

comb <- bind_rows(fluxes_2021, fluxes_2025) %>%
  mutate(Year = year(TIMESTAMP)) %>%
  filter(CO2_slope_ppm_per_day > 0 |
           (hour(TIMESTAMP) > 6 & hour(TIMESTAMP) < 20)) %>%
  filter(!Year==2021|!MIU_VALVE%in%c(1,8,5),
         !Year == 2026,
         month(TIMESTAMP) %in% c(6,7))

comb %>%
  mutate(MIU_VALVE = factor(MIU_VALVE, levels = 1:12, 
                            labels = chamber_levels)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = CH4_slope_ppm_per_day, y = MIU_VALVE, fill = MIU_VALVE))+
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0, color = "grey50")+
  stat_density_ridges(
    geom = "density_ridges",
    quantiles = 2,
    quantile_lines = TRUE,
    n = 2048,
    rel_min_height = 0.005,
    scale = 0.9
  ) +
  xlab(expression(CH[4]~"(ppm"~m^-2~s^-1*")"))+
  scale_fill_manual(values = color.gradient)+
  coord_cartesian(xlim = c(-2,20))+
  egg::theme_article()+
  facet_wrap(~Year)+
  theme(legend.position = "none",
        axis.title.y = element_blank())

quants <- comb %>%
  filter(!is.na(CH4_slope_ppm_per_day)) %>%
  mutate(MIU_VALVE = factor(MIU_VALVE, levels = 1:12, 
                            labels = chamber_levels),
         Date = as.Date(TIMESTAMP),
         Temp_C = sub("c_[0-9]+_[e|a]", "", MIU_VALVE),
         Temp_C = as.numeric(sub("mb", "0", Temp_C)),
         yday = yday(Date)) %>%
  group_by(yday)  %>%
  filter(length(unique(MIU_VALVE[Year == 2025])) == 12 &
           length(unique(MIU_VALVE[Year == 2021])) == 9) %>%
  group_by(MIU_VALVE, Temp_C, Year) %>%
  summarize(q_50 = quantile(CH4_slope_ppm_per_day, .50),
            #q_5 = quantile(CH4, .05),
            q_95 = quantile(CH4_slope_ppm_per_day, .95),
            q_99 = quantile(CH4_slope_ppm_per_day, .99),
            n = n(),
            dates = length(unique(Date))) %>%
  pivot_longer(q_50:q_99) %>%
  group_by(name, Year) %>%
  mutate(ref = mean(value[Temp_C == 0]),
         name = as.numeric(sub("q_", "", name)),
         name_txt = paste0(name, "th quantile"),
         name_txt = fct_reorder(name_txt, name)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Temp_C, y = value/ref * 100))+
  geom_hline(yintercept = 100, color = "grey50")+
  geom_smooth(color = "black", fill = "grey70")+
  geom_point(aes(fill = MIU_VALVE), color = "black", 
             shape = 21, size = 2, stroke = 0.5)+
  scale_fill_manual(values = color.gradient, name = "Chamber")+
  ylab(expression(atop(CH[4]~"flux quantile value", "(% of ambient; µmol"~m^-2~s^-1*")")))+
  xlab("Temperature treatment (ºC above ambient)")+
  facet_grid(Year~name_txt)+
  egg::theme_article()+
  theme(panel.grid.major = element_line(color = "grey95"))

quants

ggsave("../figures/quantiles_2021.jpg", width = 6, height = 3)
```

```{r}
chambers <- c(2:4, 6:7,9:12)
quants_rel <- comb %>%
  filter(!is.na(CH4_slope_ppm_per_day),
         MIU_VALVE %in% chambers) %>%
  mutate(MIU_VALVE = factor(MIU_VALVE, levels = chambers, 
                            labels = chamber_levels[chambers]),
         Date = as.Date(TIMESTAMP),
         Temp_C = sub("c_[0-9]+_[e|a]", "", MIU_VALVE),
         Temp_C = as.numeric(sub("mb", "0", Temp_C)),
         yday = yday(Date)) %>%
  group_by(yday)  %>%
  filter(length(unique(MIU_VALVE[Year == 2025])) == 9 &
           length(unique(MIU_VALVE[Year == 2021])) == 9) %>%
  group_by(MIU_VALVE, Temp_C, Year) %>%
  summarize(q_50 = quantile(CH4_slope_ppm_per_day, .50),
            #q_5 = quantile(CH4, .05),
            q_95 = quantile(CH4_slope_ppm_per_day, .95),
            q_99 = quantile(CH4_slope_ppm_per_day, .99),
            n = n(),
            dates = length(unique(Date))) %>%
  pivot_longer(q_50:q_99) %>%
  group_by(name, MIU_VALVE) %>%
  mutate(ref_year = mean(value[Year == 2021]),
         rel_value = value/ref_year) %>%
  filter(Year == 2025) %>%
  group_by(name) %>%
  mutate(ref = mean(rel_value[Temp_C == 0], na.rm = T),
         name = as.numeric(sub("q_", "", name)),
         name_txt = paste0(name, "th quantile"),
         name_txt = fct_reorder(name_txt, name)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Temp_C, y = rel_value/ref * 100))+
  geom_hline(yintercept = 100, color = "grey50")+
  geom_smooth(color = "black", fill = "grey70",
              method = "gam", formula = y ~ s(x, bs = "cs", k = 3))+
  geom_point(aes(fill = MIU_VALVE), color = "black", 
             shape = 21, size = 2, stroke = 0.5)+
  scale_fill_manual(values = color.gradient, name = "Chamber")+
  ylab(expression(atop(CH[4]~"flux quantile value relative to 2021", "(% of ambient; ppm"~m^-2~d^-1*")")))+
  xlab("Temperature treatment (ºC above ambient)")+
  facet_wrap(~name_txt, nrow = 1)+
  egg::theme_article()+
  theme(panel.grid.major = element_line(color = "grey95"))

quants_rel

ggsave("../figures/quantiles_2021_rel.jpg", width = 6, height = 3)
```
